title: damaged_water_pump_purchase_under_time_constraint
summary: A water pump purchased for farm use arrived with physical defects, but was accepted due to urgent operational necessity.
description: This data unit documents the purchase of a water pump priced at 900 THB that arrived in damaged condition, specifically missing a handle. Due to urgent farm operational needs and the inability to wait 7â€“15 days for a replacement, the pump was tested and accepted despite the defect. The pump was confirmed to be functional and integrated into farm operations under time and resource constraints.
